channel.title: [NON]How to change the distance between you and the npc when fighting[NON]
channel.description:
[b]This is my first tut on how to change the distance between you, and the monster when you are fighting it.[/b]
[b]IF YOU KNOW HOW TO DO THIS ALREADY THEN DON'T READ MY TUT OTHER WISE PEOPLE WANT TO KNOW.[/b]
[u]Alright let take a look at this code[/u] [code]if(i == 1115) { // NPC ID aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60.anInt1406 = anIntArray72[630]; class5.method165(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60); // Collect original NPC data class5.aStringArray66 = new String[5]; class5.aStringArray66[1] = "Attack"; class5.anIntArray94 = new int[2]; // Number of models the NPC uses int changedColors = 1; // Number of model colors changed on the NPC class5.anIntArray76 = new int[changedColors]; class5.anIntArray70 = new int[changedColors]; class5.anIntArray76[0] = 61; // Original model color class5.anIntArray70[0] = 926; // Changed model color class5.anIntArray94[0] = 10490; // 27789 class5.anIntArray94[1] = 10491; // 27785 class5.anInt67 = 7058; //walk emote class5.anInt77 = 7059; //stand emote class5.aString65 = "General Graardor"; // NPC name [color=blue]class5.anInt61 = 624; //combat level class5.aByte68 = 4; class5.anInt91 = 110;//width class5.anInt86 = 110;//height class5.aByteArray89 = "A huge war chief.".getBytes(); // NPC description }[/code]
Scroll down at the last 4 line you will see till you see this code [color=red]class5.aByte68 = 4;[/color].That is the code that will keep the distance from you, and the monster when you are fighting.
[b][size=10pt]So if you use class5.aByte68 = [color=red]4[/color] it will keep the distance away as you go higher, you and the monster get a faller distance from each other.[/size][/b]
[size=12pt][u]Use this code and add it under [color=blue]class5.anInt61 = 624; //combat level[/color] or any other place in class 5 that works to you.[/u][/size] [code=abap]class5.aByte68 = 4;[/code]
[shadow=red,left]NO LEECHING [ You really gonna leech on someone first post?][/shadow] :| [img]http://www.runesx.ucoz.net/images/logog.png[/img]

item.title: [NON]How to change the distance between you and the npc when fighting[NON]
item.dc:creator: @darkdata darkdata
item.description:
@darkdata wrote:

This is my first tut on how to change the distance between you, and the monster when you are fighting it.

IF YOU KNOW HOW TO DO THIS ALREADY THEN DON’T READ MY TUT OTHER WISE PEOPLE WANT TO KNOW.

Alright let take a look at this code

if(i == 1115) { // NPC ID aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60.anInt1406 = anIntArray72[630]; class5.method165(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60); // Collect original NPC data class5.aStringArray66 = new String[5]; class5.aStringArray66[1] = "Attack"; class5.anIntArray94 = new int[2]; // Number of models the NPC uses int changedColors = 1; // Number of model colors changed on the NPC class5.anIntArray76 = new int[changedColors]; class5.anIntArray70 = new int[changedColors]; class5.anIntArray76[0] = 61; // Original model color class5.anIntArray70[0] = 926; // Changed model color class5.anIntArray94[0] = 10490; // 27789 class5.anIntArray94[1] = 10491; // 27785 class5.anInt67 = 7058; //walk emote class5.anInt77 = 7059; //stand emote class5.aString65 = "General Graardor"; // NPC name [color=blue]class5.anInt61 = 624; //combat level class5.aByte68 = 4; class5.anInt91 = 110;//width class5.anInt86 = 110;//height class5.aByteArray89 = "A huge war chief.".getBytes(); // NPC description }

Scroll down at the last 4 line you will see till you see this code [color=red]class5.aByte68 = 4;[/color].That is the code that will keep the distance from you, and the monster when you are fighting.

[size=10pt]So if you use class5.aByte68 = [color=red]4[/color] it will keep the distance away as you go higher, you and the monster get a faller distance from each other.[/size]

[size=12pt]Use this code and add it under [color=blue]class5.anInt61 = 624; //combat level[/color] or any other place in class 5 that works to you.[/size]

class5.aByte68 = 4;

[shadow=red,left]NO LEECHING [ You really gonna leech on someone first post?][/shadow]
